insights.title: XML sitemap missing critical pages
insights.detail: Several category pages are not included in the sitemap.

insights.title: Robots.txt allows crawler blocking
insights.detail: Templates directory disallowed which blocks important assets.

issues.title: Missing canonical tags
issues.description: Multiple list pages lack canonical tags leading to duplicate signals.

recommendations.title: Regenerate sitemap including category pages
recommendations.detail: Include all live category and product pages in sitemap.xml and submit to Search Console.

recommendations.title: Add canonical tags to list pages
recommendations.detail: Ensure list pages set canonical to primary pagination-free URL.

insights.title: Shallow product descriptions
insights.detail: ~70% of product pages use manufacturer text only.

insights.title: Thin category pages
insights.detail: Category landing pages lack unique editorial content.

issues.title: Missing alt text for hero images
issues.description: Product hero images missing alt attributes.

recommendations.title: Enrich product descriptions
recommendations.detail: Add 150-300 words unique copy focusing on use cases and benefits.

recommendations.title: Add alt text to major images
recommendations.detail: Provide descriptive alt text for accessibility and image understanding.

issues.title: Toxic links detected
issues.description: Some backlinks flagged as potentially spammy.

recommendations.title: Pursue diverse editorial links
recommendations.detail: Create linkable assets and outreach plan focused on niche publications.

issues.title: CLS spikes on product pages
issues.description: Layout shifts caused by late-loading images.

recommendations.title: Reserve image dimensions and use preload
recommendations.detail: Set width/height and consider rel=preload for hero images.

insights.title: Product schema present but incomplete
insights.detail: Missing aggregateRating and offers for many products.

issues.title: Invalid JSON-LD snippets
issues.description: A few pages return schema errors in Search Console.

recommendations.title: Complete product schema fields
recommendations.detail: Add offers, availability, and aggregateRating where available.

insights.title: Author bylines missing
insights.detail: Product and editorial pages often lack author or expertise signals.

issues.title: No trust signals on checkout
issues.description: Missing contact and policy links on checkout flow.

recommendations.title: Add author and review metadata
recommendations.detail: Show author profiles and review summaries where applicable.

modules.name: Non-Branded Coverage
modules.description: Share of keywords not tied to brand terms

insights.title: Low rankings on intent keywords
insights.detail: Few non-branded queries rank in top 10 for core categories.

issues.title: Over-reliance on branded content
issues.description: Landing pages optimized for brand-first queries.

recommendations.title: Create intent-led landing pages
recommendations.detail: Build pages targeting top non-branded intents and informational queries.

insights.title: Sitemap well-structured
insights.detail: Sitemap includes priority tags and lastmod dates.

recommendations.title: Maintain current crawl hygiene
recommendations.detail: Continue monitoring Search Console for index warnings.

insights.title: Strong category guides
insights.detail: Long-form buyer guides performing well for informational queries.

recommendations.title: Scale guides to adjacent categories
recommendations.detail: Repurpose high-performing guides for related product lines.

insights.title: Healthy referring domains
insights.detail: Diverse editorial links from niche publications.

modules.name: Non-Branded Coverage
modules.description: Share of keywords not tied to brand terms

insights.title: Blocked sections in robots.txt
insights.detail: Important product images blocked from crawlers.

recommendations.title: Fix server stability and unblock assets
recommendations.detail: Coordinate infra to reduce 5xx and update robots.txt.

insights.title: Sparse documentation
insights.detail: Knowledge base articles are short and not updated.

recommendations.title: Audit and expand KB content
recommendations.detail: Update and expand high-traffic support articles.

insights.title: Low domain authority signals
insights.detail: Few editorial backlinks and low citation flow.

recommendations.title: Invest in content-led link campaigns
recommendations.detail: Create industry reports and outreach to gain editorial links.

recommendations.title: Implement base product schema
recommendations.detail: Start with basic Product schema across catalog pages.

modules.name: Non-Branded Coverage
modules.description: Share of keywords not tied to brand terms

recommendations.title: Keyword intent mapping and new pages
recommendations.detail: Map top non-branded intents and build targeted pages.
